channel.title: Need help, i am a new
channel.description: hey guys... i am really new with making servers, i am trying to make my own server using test source. could any1 tell me what to type in my compile and compiler, and my runserver.bat pleasE? thanks

item.title: Need help, i am a new
item.dc:creator: @str_rockstar str rockstar
item.description:
@str_rockstar wrote:

Compiler:

@echo off javac *.java

run .bat would be

@echo off java client

or is it

@echo off java server

Read full topic
